result.execSummary:
The defendant Damien F Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant IS eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.
Defendant IS NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program.
Apply 484 days sentence credit.
AMENDED 11-22-2017:  Apply 265 days sentence credit.
Concurrent with: Ozaukee County Case 15CF10 and Milwaukee County Case 16CF2229.
CORRECTED:  Concurrent with Ozaukee County Case 15CF10 and Milwaukee  County Case 16CF2229 BUT Consecutive to any other sentence.

superMiscConds.notes:
Restitution is ordered as follows:  $443.01 payable to Dennis Babe and $666.19 to Allied Insurance.  To be paid joint and several as a Condition of Extended Supervision and to be paid BEFORE costs/fines/surcharges.
AMENDED 05-22-2017:  Court orders additional restitution in the amount of $2,979.  To be paid Joint/Several to the the victim (C. S.) as a Condition of Extended Supervision and to be paid BEFORE costs/fines/surcharges.
AMENDED 06/15/2018 COURT MODIFIES THE RESTITUTION TO $2,979.64 (for Christen S.); $443.41 (for Dennis B.) and $666.19 for Allied Insurance FOR A TOTAL OF $4,089.24
Court costs and DNA surcharge are to be paid as a Condition of Extended Supervision.

No contact with the victims.

  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

  If Probation/Extended Supervision is revoked and/or a prison term ordered, outstanding financial obligations shall be collected pursuant to statutory provisions, including deductions from inmate prison monies.  If discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collections may include income assignment.

State presented response.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Damien F Robinson in court, in custody, with attorney Eugene E. Detert.  Stephen Joseph Centinario appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2.  Court conducts colloquy with defendant.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Counts 1 and 3 are dismissed and read-in.  State makes sentencing argument.  Attorney Detert makes sentencing argument.  Defendant makes statement.  

The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

IMPOSED SENTENCE of: 

11 YEARS IMPRISONMENT (CREDIT - 484 days) Concurrent to Ozaukee Co 15CF10 and Milwaukee Co 16CF2229
  -  6 YEAR(S) OF INITIAL CONFINEMENT
  -  5 YEAR(S) OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION;

CONDITIONS OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION:  
*No contact with:  victims

RESTITUTION:  $443.01 to D.B. and $666.19 to Allied Insurance joint and several (to be paid from prison wages and/or to be paid as a condition of extended supervision - restitution to be paid before costs or fines);
Court to hold separate restitution hearing as to Christen Schweikar.  Defendant to appear by video for restitution hearing.

COURT COSTS and DRGOD:  $260.00 (to be paid from prison wages and/or to be paid as a condition of extended supervision);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $268.00 (to be paid from prison wages and/or to be paid as a condition of extended supervision);
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Defendant is eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.
Defendant is not eligible for Substance Abuse Program.

Felony warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.

Defendant to be returned to Fox Lake forthwith.  Restitution hearing scheduled for May 22, 2017 at 11:30 am.
